actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for conditions on the renewal of health insurance plans purchased through Exchanges.
short_title: Heath Care Consumer Choices Preservation Act

summary.text: Heath Care Consumer Choices Preservation Act - Prohibits automatic renewal for 2015 of an individual's health plan purchased through a health exchange for coverage in 2014 unless the 2015 premiums are the same as the 2014 premiums (before and after federal subsidies) or the individual requests automatic renewal.

titles.title: Heath Care Consumer Choices Preservation Act
A bill to provide for conditions on the renewal of health insurance plans purchased through Exchanges.
